metadata.title: CVE-2018-14073 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
libsixel 1.8.1 has a memory leak in sixel_allocator_new in allocator.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14073` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.2-1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.2-1
libsixel1 - 1.8.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-1').
